Title: ARK000: Introduction to ARK (Acts of Random Kindness Project)
Description:
Welcome to ARK000 — the kickoff for ARK (Acts of Random Kindness) 🌟
This is an open source, nonprofit project to build a mobile app that encourages people to do something kind every single day — and share their stories, photos, or videos with the world. No ads. No catch. Just good people doing good things.

In this stream:
0/ What is ARK?
1/ Why kindness needs its own platform
2/ How we're building it (Blazor MAUI 🚀)
3/ How you can get involved (code, design, ideas, support)

It’s free — as in free tea and free speech. 🍵🗣️
If you’re looking for something positive to build, you’re in the right place.

Let’s make something beautiful together.
